Bone-headed move
 




Baron Davis is ejected at the end of the third quarter.  (Getty Images)



    

    

      Golden State's Baron Davis is brilliant in Game 1 and a dufus 
      in Game 2, Tony Mejia says. Davis' late ejection for 
      arguing with refs blows away any chance for a Warriors comeback during 
      their 112-99 loss 
      to the Mavericks.

 Sabres' dominance over Rangers carries into playoffs


    

      
      Playoffs. Regular season. It makes little 
      difference to Buffalo when facing off against New York. 
      The Sabres take care of business during Game 1 with a 5-2 victory.
    

  
• Ducks prevail | THU:  OTT-NJ, 7 | SJ-DET, 7:30


 

 





 Pistone: Smoke blows off steam; NASCAR disappointed


    

      He's been competitive all season, but when 
      it comes to winning, Tony Stewart has had nothing but bad 
      luck. All that came to a boiling point Tuesday on his radio show.
